name: Crafts and Combat Again
description:
-Submission to the Game Dev Knockout Jam (Round 3)-

TASK: Create a boss fight

Fight through waves of hand drawn opponents in a world of paper... again...
Now featuring a brand new boss fight against your creator.

Controls:
Arrows keys - Move
Z - Jump, Double Jump
X - Attack
C - Dash

Credits:
- SFX by Kenney
-Music from FreeMusicArchive
--Komiku - Opening !
--Komiku - Battle of Pogs
--Komiku - WIN
--Komiku - Poupi Great Adventures
--Monplaisir - Defeat
--Monplaisir - Level 2
